div.ab: [(chi)(rho) The most honorable Patrophilos, son of Bassos, has given] on account of his taxes of the thirteenth, [fourteenth and] fifteenth indiction years, that is, of three previous years, [every year from nine, one fourth, one eighth iugera from Petra and from] Augustopolis, one half, one third, one tenth, one [hundred and seventy-fifth] i( ), all the exacted and extra taxes in farm products, in oinokreon [and in other products accordingly. Written] in month Loos of the 460-third (=463d) year, the first indiction year. [(chi)(rho) I, Flavius Valens, son of Alpheios, have received in full for the] present and future tax collectors accordingly. (chi)(rho) [...the] paid (dues) and (dues) on account of the first indiction year. [...] and for your security this [receipt has been written ...]...
